title: FS: P2 LL Archer with rare blank insert
author: edhans

posts.post_title: FS: P2 LL Archer with rare blank insert
posts.post_content: Scarce Large Letter P2 pin of Jimmy Archer PSA A for sale. $100.00 delivered. The large letter Archer is among the more difficult subjects in the P2 set. Very rare blank paper insert. I have never seen another like it. Check or money order only. No electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. Please reserve via email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. No PMs, please. As always, "I'll take it" trumps requests for additional scans or discounts. First come, first served. Larger scans available on my updated website below. Thank you for looking.
